description: This file is a PHP source code for managing HS Port Forwarding settings in a web-based router configuration interface. It includes server-side logic to fetch and display port forwarding rules and client-side JavaScript to handle user interactions such as enabling/disabling the feature, adding, editing, and deleting port forwarding entries.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Fetches a string parameter value from the backend configuration/state.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values from specified object paths in the device configuration.
